languages.text: {n}Префект продолжает декламировать. Вы замечаете, как присутствующие украдкой зевают или усиленно моргают, стараясь не заснуть. Несмотря на то, что речь длится добрых пять минут, вы с честью выдерживаете это испытание. Наконец, префект умолкает.{/n}

{n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект продолжает декламировать. Вы замечаете, как присутствующие украдкой зевают или усиленно моргают, стараясь не заснуть. Несмотря на то, что речь длится добрых пять минут, вы с честью выдерживаете это испытание. Наконец, префект умолкает.{/n}

{n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète poursuit son cérémonial élaboré. Parmi la foule assemblée, vous remarquez des bâillements mal dissimulés et des clignements d'yeux répétés. Le discours se prolonge encore cinq bonnes minutes, mais c'est avec les honneurs que vous surmontez cette épreuve de patience. Puis, l'interminable laïus s'achève enfin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète poursuit son cérémonial élaboré. Parmi la foule assemblée, vous remarquez des bâillements mal dissimulés et des clignements d'yeux répétés. Le discours se prolonge encore cinq bonnes minutes, mais c'est avec les honneurs que vous surmontez cette épreuve de patience. Puis, l'interminable laïus s'achève enfin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta continúa con su elaborada fórmula. Reparas en varios bostezos disimulados con torpeza y parpadeos frenéticos entre la multitud. Su discurso continúa durante otros cinco minutos, pero superas esta prueba de resistencia con dignidad. Finalmente, el saludo de la prefecta llega a su conclusión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta continúa con su elaborada fórmula. Reparas en varios bostezos disimulados con torpeza y parpadeos frenéticos entre la multitud. Su discurso continúa durante otros cinco minutos, pero superas esta prueba de resistencia con dignidad. Finalmente, el saludo de la prefecta llega a su conclusión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行政官继续进行着她精心准备的问候致辞。你注意到，人群之中有几个人忍不住打了个呵欠，还有几个人拼命地眨着眼睛。致辞又进行了五分钟，但你顺利通过了这场耐力的考验。到最后，行政官的致辞终于结束了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官继续进行着她精心准备的问候致辞。你注意到，人群之中有几个人忍不住打了个呵欠，还有几个人拼命地眨着眼睛。致辞又进行了五分钟，但你顺利通过了这场耐力的考验。到最后，行政官的致辞终于结束了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin fährt mit ihrer umständlichen Ansprache fort. Einige der Umstehenden gähnen unverhohlen und blinzeln mit den Augen. Die Begrüßung dauert weitere fünf Minuten, aber du meisterst diese Prüfung deiner Seelenstärke mit Bravour. Schließlich kommt die Präfektin zum Ende.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin fährt mit ihrer umständlichen Ansprache fort. Einige der Umstehenden gähnen unverhohlen und blinzeln mit den Augen. Die Begrüßung dauert weitere fünf Minuten, aber du meisterst diese Prüfung deiner Seelenstärke mit Bravour. Schließlich kommt die Präfektin zum Ende.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総監は仰々しい挨拶を再開する。群衆の中に隠し切れていない欠伸やひどく興奮した苛立ちに気づく。演説はさらに5分続くが、この忍耐力の試験に見事に合格する。ついに、総監の演説が終わりを迎える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は仰々しい挨拶を再開する。群衆の中に隠し切れていない欠伸やひどく興奮した苛立ちに気づく。演説はさらに5分続くが、この忍耐力の試験に見事に合格する。ついに、総監の演説が終わりを迎える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, özenli formülünü sürdürüyor. Kalabalığın arasında dikkat çeken birkaç esneme ve delice göz kırpış fark ediyorsun. Konuşma beş dakika daha sürerken sen de bu metanet sınavını gayet başarıyla geçiyorsun. Nihayet prefektin konuşması sona eriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect resumes her elaborate formula. You notice a few poorly concealed yawns and frenzied blinking among the crowd. The speech drags on for another five minutes, but you pass this test of fortitude honourably. At last, the prefect's address comes to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt, özenli formülünü sürdürüyor. Kalabalığın arasında dikkat çeken birkaç esneme ve delice göz kırpış fark ediyorsun. Konuşma beş dakika daha sürerken sen de bu metanet sınavını gayet başarıyla geçiyorsun. Nihayet prefektin konuşması sona eriyor.{/n}
